rules_text:
Basic lands you control have all basic land types.
[i]Augmented[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: [i]Like a vision she dances across the stars.[/i]
